title: Find Me If You Can
overview: Find Me If You Can is a mystery, romance-thriller drama about a four-way love affair centering around Sun Jung, and her mission to find out who has been stalking her. Sun Jung is caught in the middle of three man confessing to her; her lively long trusted friend, Sul Yoo Hwan, the ex-boyfriend, who is trying to get back together with her, and acting star, Choi Jung Sang, who boldly pursues whatever he wants. On top of all that, Sun Jung is starting to receive a couple of suspicious messages making her question, who is the one watching her.
